product_name: The North Face Dipsea 78 Trainer Shoes - Men's
long_description: Inspired by first-generation running shoes, the Dipsea 78 Trainer Shoes from The North Face combine cool retro style with modern touches such as Vibram(R) rubber outsoles for around-town comfort. Mesh uppers with suede overlays provide lightweight, breathable coverage; moisture-wicking synthetic mesh linings provide next-to-skin comfort. OrthoLite(R) ReBound footbeds and EVA midsoles provide comfortable cushioning and support. Durable Vibram rubber outsoles on the Dipsea 78 Trainer Shoes from The North Face offer reliable traction on a variety of surfaces.
short_description: Inspired by first-generation running shoes, the Dipsea 78 Trainer Shoes from The North Face combine cool retro style with modern touches such as Vibram(R) rubber outsoles for around-town comfort.
